solution_line_template: Rebecca will make {haircut_price} * {num_haircuts} = $<<{haircut_price}*{num_haircuts}={haircut_income}>>{haircut_income} from haircuts today.
She will make {dye_job_price} * {num_dye_jobs} = $<<{dye_job_price}*{num_dye_jobs}={dye_job_income}>>{dye_job_income} from dye jobs.
She will spend {hair_dye_cost_per_box} * {num_dye_jobs} = $<<{hair_dye_cost_per_box}*{num_dye_jobs}={hair_dye_total_cost}>>{hair_dye_total_cost} on hair dye.

With the $40 perm and tips, at the end of the day, Rebecca will have {haircut_income} + {dye_job_income} + {perm_price} - {hair_dye_total_cost} + {tips} = $<<{haircut_income}+{dye_job_income}+{perm_price}-{hair_dye_total_cost}+{tips}={total_money}>>{total_money}.
